name: Frost (itch) (Finn Truong)
description:
This is my submission for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020.

Thank you for checking this game out, I had fun and learned a lot making this. 

It's a platformer where you avoid the enemy and try to collect as much flame as possible. I tried to learn and copy from  the fantastic gameplay and art style of Celeste while making this. I hope you have fun playing it.

Control:

WASD: move

Space: Jump/Double Jump

Left Shift: Dash
